name: Hold The Gate
description:
This is a early access build of this game.

This game only has fixed 3 minutes of gameplay. There is a secret level which can be activated by shooting a special road sign.

"Hold the gate" is a casual FPS shooter game. Here the player has to defend the gate from hordes of monsters. Players has two different weapons to kill the monsters. Player can activate auto turrets to help defend the gate.
